name: SmartONE
0:
”Alexa set Bedroom to 21 degree”
”make Bedroom warmer”
”set Bedroom to automatic”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
With the skill SmartONE skill and Alexa, you can now interact with your skill SmartONE devices by voice. To get started, select the 'Enable Skill' button in the Alexa App to link your skill SmartONE account and discover your devices. 

When using the skill, you need established names for your devices. There are two ways to define these names:

Use the names you previously set up. They are shown in the skill SmartONE app and can be changed
Create an Alexa group, like Bedroom or Downstairs, and add the device to the group. 
Once you know the name or group name for your devices, you can say the following:

Depending on the types of devices your skill supports, choose example phrases from the Use Your Smart Home Device with Alexa page and replace [bracketed text] with names appropriate for your skill. Example:

"Alexa, set Bedroom to 21 degrees."
"Alexa, make Bedroom warmer."

If you have any questions, please visit the skill SmartONE FAQ at skill SmartONE Link to Your US FAQ
